{"tiddlers": {
"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/actions": {
    "title": "$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/actions",

    "modified": "20220524014759393",
    "tags": "$:/tags/StartupAction",
    "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki",
    "text": "<$reveal type=\"gteq\" state=\"$:/info/browser/screen/width\" text={{{ [{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}removesuffix[px]] }}}>\n\n</$reveal>",
    "revision": "0",
    "bag": "default"
},

"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/icon": {
    "title": "$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/icon",
    "text": "",
    "type": "image/png",
    "created": "20220520110349667",
    "modified": "20220520110351661",

},

"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/readme": {
    "title": "$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/readme",
    "created": "20220520103353035",
    "modified": "20220522003811875",
    "tags": "",
    "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki",
    "text": "Better tiddlywiki scrollbar\n\n* how to add hover to width it",
    "revision": "0",
    "bag": "default"
},

"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/styles": {
    "created": "20220212200401023",
    "text": "\\rules only filteredtranscludeinline transcludeinline macrodef macrocallinline html\n\nhtml {\n  --scrollbarBG: <<color page-background>>;\n  --thumbBG: <<color sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground>>;\n\t/*other candidate colors: foreground, sidebar-tiddler-link-foreground */\n}\n\n/* only for Twilight palette use <<color sidebar-muted-foreground>> */\n\n/* Works on Firefox */\n* {\n  scrollbar-width: thin;\n}\n/* for Chrome, Edge */\n::-webkit-scrollbar,\n  scrollbar-width {\n  width: 5px;\n  height:5px;\n}\n\n::-webkit-scrollbar:hover,\n  scrollbar-width {\n  width: 5.5px;\n}\n\n::-webkit-scrollbar-track {\n  background: var(--scrollbarBG);\n}\n\n/* background-color: var(--thumbBG) ;\n\tbackground: linear-gradient(to top, #00f260, #0575e6); */\n::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {\n  border-radius: 3px;\n  border: 0px solid var(--scrollbarBG);\n\tbackground: linear-gradient(45deg, #00f260, #3AC9E1);\n}\n\n::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {\n    background: linear-gradient(to top, #12c2e9, #c471ed, #f64f59); /* W3C, IE 10+/ Edge, Firefox 16+, Chrome 26+, Opera 12+, Safari 7+ */;\n}",
    "title": "$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar/styles",
    "caption": "Scrollbar",
    "creator": "oeyoews",
    "modified": "20220524055524525",
    "modifier": "oeyoews",
    "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet",
    "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki",
    "revision": "0",
    "bag": "default"
},

"oeyoews/tw-scrollbar": {
    "title": "oeyoews/tw-scrollbar",
    "cpl.author": "oeyoews",
    "cpl.core-version": ">=5.2.2",
    "cpl.description": "better scrollbar",
    "cpl.documentation": "https://twms.vercel.app/",
    "cpl.name": "tw-scrollbar",
    "cpl.plugin-type": "plugin",
    "cpl.readme": "better tiddlywiki scrollbar",
    "cpl.source": "https://twms.vercel.app/",
    "cpl.title": "$:/plugins/oeyoews/tw-scrollbar",
    "cpl.uri": "https://twms.vercel.app/index.html",
    "created": "20220520105919869",
    "icon": "ðŸ“œ",
    "modified": "20220520110111091",
    "page-cover": "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1580501170961-bb0dbf63a6df?crop=entropy&cs=tinysrgb&fm=jpg&ixlib=rb-1.2.1&q=60&raw_url=true&ixid=MnwxMjA3fDB8MHxzZWFyY2h8MXx8c2Nyb2xsfGVufDB8fDB8fA%3D%3D&auto=format&fit=crop&w=500",
    "tags": "$:/tags/PluginWiki",
    "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki",
    "revision": "0",
    "bag": "default"
}}
}
